title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet.
EB: I would have expected the behavior where the combo box is always the width of the property sheet column. Note that it should work the same as the DialogCellEditor where the button is always visible. We need to investigate to determine if this issue is caused by us or by SWT library.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Navigate to the column where ComboBoxCellEditor is used.
3. Observe that the width of the combo box does not match the width of the property sheet column.
